name: Big Mama
quote: “If Mama ain’t happy, ain’y NOBODY happy.”
title: Heat

name: Brutha From Anotha Planet
quote: “You ain’t from around here, are you?”
abilities: Defense = +6 vs. ‘Alien’ Attacks.
title: Disco

name: Cabbie
quote: “I got special rates for following cars.”
abilities: The Cabbie cannot own any ‘Vehicle’ Props.
title: Savage

name: Cop From Harlem
quote: “I was born on these streets and now I’m back to clean ‘em up.”
abilities: Gains +1 DS for every other ‘Soul’ Character in the same Movie.
title: Squad

name: Fed-Up Hooker
quote: “I’ve had it up to here with your jive and I’m not taking it lying down anymore.”
abilities: Gains +1 DS for every other ‘Soul’ Character in the same Movie.
title: Honky

name: Fence
quote: “I ask no questions except ‘how much?’”
abilities: Discard two cards from your hand to take a Prop from the discard pile and give it to any Character in play.
title: Deep

name: Go-Go Dancer
quote: “The shorter the skirt, the higher the cost.”
abilities: Gives +1 DS to all ‘Males’ in the same Movie.
title: Out

name: Informant
quote: “I don’t know about the WORD on the street, but I can tell you about the chalk outline.”
abilities: Anytime you like (but no more than once during any given player’s turn) you may look at the top card of the draw pile.
title: Soul

name: One Night Stand
quote: “You’re great in the sack, but you’re pretty crappy afterwards.”
abilities: Must be removed from play if you don’t have any ‘Male’ Characters in play. Take a mulligan if she is the only Character in your initial draw.
title: Money

name: Police Captain
quote: “Warms my black heart to see you so concerned for us minority folks, captain.”
abilities: Gives +1 DS to all “Cop” Characters in the same Movie.
title: Baby

name: Private Dick
quote: “Who’s the sex machine to all the chicks?”
abilities: While the Private Dick is in your Movie you may draw a card every time you kill another Character.
title: Lead

name: Rally Race Driver
quote: “The highway to Hell better have a passing lane!”
abilities: Gains double the printed Defense from ‘Vehicle’ Props and triple the printed Defense from the “Muscle Car”.
title: Gun

name: Safe Cracker
quote: “I can get you in, but getting back out is your department.”
abilities: On your turn you may take one Prop from an opponent. You may either give the Prop to the Safe-Cracker or you may discard it and draw cards up to the printed DS of that Prop.
title: Jones

name: Sidekick
quote: “Right turn, Clyde.”
title: Gold

name: Skippy the Wonder Dawg
quote: “What’s that Skippy? You can dig it? Right on, Skippy. Right on.”
abilities: May not use Props… except for the “Pimp Hat”. Skippy can have the trait ‘Soul’ whenever you want.
title: Dawg

name: Stereotypically Flamboyant Gay Guy
quote: “I told her I was gay and she said she’d straighten me out. I said, ‘Honey, you don’t have the right equipment!’”
abilities: Gains +1 DS for every other ‘Male’ Character in the same Movie.
title: Connection

name: Street Hustler
quote: “Three Card Monte is a respectable… oh, here comes the fuzz… gotta go!”
abilities: On your turn, you may name three cards, one of which must be in your hand. Pick a player to guess which one it is. Show that player your hand and if they guessed right, you must give them the card. If they guessed wrong you may take a card at random from their hand.
title: Man

name: The Do-Gooder
quote: “Sure, it’s my civic duty, but that don’t pay the bills.”
abilities: You can give the Do-Gooder the Trait ‘Soul’ when you play him. Sacrifice the Do-Gooder to save any of your other characters from being killed.
title: Slave

name: The Reverend Minister
quote: “The Lord died for your sins… and now you’re going to join him!”
abilities: Defense = +6 vs. ‘Supernatural’ Attacks.
title: Super

name: Treasury Agent
quote: “I work for my uncle, Uncle Sam.”
abilities: Once during your turn only, you may confiscate one Location or Prop from another player’s Movie and put it in the discard pile. The target player may prevent the loss by bribing you with 2 cards from their hand.
title: Way

name: Trucker
quote: “Keep on truckin’.”
abilities: Defense = +10 while in the “Truck Stop”.
title: Ride

name: Undercover Cop
quote: “No, baby, I ain’t no cop…”
abilities: You can play Undercover Cop in an opponents Movie. At the end of your next turn discard the Undercover Cop and one other Character in that Movie.
title: Dirty

name: Vengeful Sista
quote: “She’s six feet o’ dynomite.”
abilities: Gains a permanent +2 DS every time a ‘Family’ Character is killed until she leaves play.
title: Trick

name: Vigilante
quote: “I’m a law abiding citizen, but for you scum, I’ll make an exception.”
abilities: If the Vigilante has a ‘Gun’ you may sacrifice that ‘Gun’ to kill a number of Characters in play up to the ‘Gun’s printed DS. You may not kill a Character in a Movie with a lower total DS than your Movie. You may not use this ability during an Attack.
title: Cool

name: Bell Bottomed Badasses on the Mean Streets of Funk
quote: “Forget the blue, we just gonna beat you black!”
abilities: If successful, the Badasses can kill 2 Characters as long as neither of them have the Traits ‘Soul’ or ‘Native’.
title: Harlem

name: Biker Gang
quote: “At the open road… a new town in front of you, and the flames and sounds of sirens behind you.”
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’ and ‘Vehicles’ to boost AS.
title: King

name: Blackula
quote: “You shall be the queen of my Nubian undead army, you dig?”
abilities: May be played as a Special Effect to give any other Creature card the Trait ‘Swarm’ and double its current Attack Strength.
title: Ebony

name: Da Man
quote: “Sooner or later, everybody gonna get hassled by da Man.”
abilities: If Da Man succeeds, the losing player is hassled and must discard one card during their turn immediately after drawing cards for the turn. No player may be hassled by Da Man more than once per game. They may stop the hassling by skipping a turn.
title: Bad

name: Dirty Politician
quote: BLAM! “Well I guess that’s one vote I won’t be getting next November,.”
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS. Gains +1 AS for every Character in the attacking player’s Movie.
title: Mob

name: Drug Lord
quote: “First one’s free. It might be your last, but it’s free.”
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS. Always succeeds at the “Bayou Mansion”.
title: Death

name: Great White
quote: “With teeth like that, who needs tentacles?”
abilities: Always succeeds at the “Beach”, the “Secluded Lagoon” and the “House Boat”.
title: Mean

name: Highway Patrol
quote: “Here comes the CHiPs, and I’m all out of dip!”
abilities: Gains +3 AS for every ‘Vehicle’ in the Movie they are attacking.
title: Mutha

name: Hired Muscle
quote: “There’s nothing quite like saying it with goons. It adds that personal touch.”
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS.
title: Sergeant

name: Holdover From the Sixties
quote: “What year did you say it was?”
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS.
title: Daddy

name: Killer Pimp
quote: “You got to realize that not every black man is yo brutha.”
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS. Always succeeds in the “House of Ill Repute”.
title: Sucka

name: Loan Shark
quote: “You’ll notice, they don’t call me a ‘loan kitten’, it’s a ‘loan _shark_.’”
abilities: Loan Shark targets one Character and only that Character’s DS (including Location and attached cards) counts for defense.
title: Sugar

name: Mugger
quote: “Think of me as a robbin’ hood.”
abilities: AS= 16 vs. Movies with no ‘Soul’ Characters. May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS.
title: Precinct

name: Officer Whitebread
quote: “Freeze scumbag!… oh go ahead and run, I’m only gonna shoot you anyway!”
abilities: AS is doubled if attacking a Movie with nothing but ‘Soul’ Characters. May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS.
title: Killer

name: Police Dogs
quote: “Spike only barks like that when he smells crime. You boys aren’t up to anything illegal, are you?”
abilities: Can be combined with “Officer Whitebread” or “Dirty Cop”. If successful, this Creature cannot kill any “Cop” Characters.
title: Assault

name: Police Shoot Out
quote: “Come” BLAM! “Out” BLAM! “And” BLAM! “You” BLAM! “Won’t” BLAM! “Be” BLAM! “Harmed.” BLAM! BLAM!
abilities: AS is tripled for every ‘Gun’ Prop played along with the Police Shoot Out.
title: Mama

name: Rich Land Developer
quote: “The three most important things in real estate: Location, location, and killing the rightful owner of the location.”
abilities: AS = 20 vs. Movies with a Location. If your Attack succeeds, you may take the Location from your target’s Movie and put it into yours. May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS.
title: Uptown

name: The Godfather
quote: “If anyone know why these two should not be wed, please fire your gun in the air now, or forever hold your peace!”
abilities: Gains +3 AS for each Creature card you discard when attacking.
title: Sista

name: The Warden
quote: “Stick him in the darkest, deepest hole we’ve got.”
abilities: The Warden always succeeds at “The Big House”.
title: Downtown

name: Wiseguy
quote: “That’s LEGITIMATE ITALIAN BUSINESSMAN, goombah!”
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS.
title: Foxy

name: Bank
quote: “Let’s shake this place up and see how much change comes out.”
abilities: Only your “Cop” Characters may have ‘Guns’ while you have the Bank in play. If any of your non-”Cop” Characters have ‘guns’ when the Bank is brought into play, the ‘Guns’ are discarded.
title: Police

name: Bayou Mansion
quote: “Be careful where you step. My gator’s got a taste for white meat.”
abilities: Double the AS of “Crocodiles” and “Albino Alligators” during an attack made by or against a player with the Bayou Mansion in play.
title: Turf

name: Car Wash
quote: “Regular clean or our special Bikini Service?”
abilities: 'Vehicles’ gain +1 DS in the Car Wash.
title: Hittin’

name: Discotheque
quote: “A sea of white polyester” (SHUDDER) “just kill me now.”
abilities: Defense = -5 vs ‘Swarm’ Attacks.
title: Gang

name: Ghetto
quote: “If it’s called the ghetto, how come I never get nothin’?”
abilities: All ‘Honky’ Attacks lose -2 AS while in the Ghetto.
title: Urban

name: House of Ill Repute
quote: “Say hello to S’Phyllis. She’ll give you what you need.”
abilities: Defense = +8 if the “Fed Up Hooker”, “Call Girl” or “Concubine” are in the House of Ill Repute.
title: Street

name: Luxury Yacht
quote: “I christen you the S.S. Ill-Gotten Gains!”
abilities: Sacrifice the Luxury Yacht from play to take any ‘Aquatic’ Location out of the discard pile or another player’s Movie and put it into your Movie. May be combined with the “Port of Hong Kong” or “New York Harbor”.
title: Shaft

name: Moon Base
quote: “You can’t leave the airlock until you put on your matching jumpsuit.”
abilities: Defense = -5 vs. ‘Alien’ Attacks.
title: Black

name: New York Harbor
quote: “How you like yo’ new pair of concrete platform disco boots?”
abilities: May be combined with the “Sewers” or the “Cargo Ship Full of Contraband”.
title: Army

name: Pawn Shop
quote: “Wow, real emeralds! I’ll give you $5.”
abilities: On your turn you may discard a Prop from your Movie and bank half the printed defense (round up). OR you may discard 1 card from your hand to take a Prop from any opponent’s Movie and give it to one of your Characters. Your opponent then banks half the printed value of the Prop (round down).
title: Jungle

name: Police Precinct
quote: “Book this mother, then throw the book at him. Then throw him at the book.”
abilities: All ‘Gun’ Props are worth double their printed value while in the Police Precinct.
title: Subway

name: Robber Rink
quote: “Only jive turkeys have wheels on their shoes.”
abilities: All ‘Soul’ Characters lose -1 DS while at the Roller Rink.
title: Color

name: The Big House
quote: “I can’t do time, man! In the joint guys like me get used as currency!”
abilities: All “Cop” Characters gain +1 DS in The Big House and all other Characters suffer -1 DS.
title: Concrete

name: Truck Stop
quote: “You want the trucker’s special? That’s steak and eggs with a side order of cheeseburgers.”
abilities: Once during your turn, you may take a ‘Vehicle’ out of the discard pile and give it to a Character in the Truck Stop.
title: Funk

name: .44 Magnum
quote: “Go ahead, make a stain.”
abilities: May be played as a Special Effect to triple the current AS of “Officer Whitebread” or “Dirty Cop”.
title: Boogie

name: Big Ass ‘Fro
quote: “Car keys… bottle opener… gimmie a sec, it’s in here somewhere…”
abilities: Grants the ‘Soul’ Trait to any Character wearing it. A Character with the Big Ass ‘Fro may receive any number of props in a single turn.
title: Hood

name: Big Wad of Cash
quote: “Perhaps Mr. Hamilton and his friends here will help ease your pain.”
abilities: Remove the Big Wad of Cash from your Movie to stop another player from playing any card. That card is discarded without any effect and the Big Wad of Cash goes into the hand of the player whose card was stopped.
title: Lady

name: Cop Car
quote: “It’s got cop shocks, cop motor, cop cup holder…”
abilities: Defense = +8 when given to any “Cop” Character.
title: Beat

name: Five Feet of Chain
quote: “Yo just a link in my chain.”
abilities: Defense = +4 in a ‘Kung Fu’ Attack.
title: Boys

name: Fur Coat
quote: “Now you know I don’t wear no cotton clothes!”
abilities: Defense = +4 to ‘Cool’ Characters.
title: Badass

name: Ghetto Blaster
quote: “Never touch a black man’s radio!”
abilities: Sacrifice from play to stop one Attack.
title: Electric

name: Land Yacht
quote: “It’s so big, it’s got its own zip code.”
abilities: Once per turn you may discard 3 cards from your had to gain +10 DS for the duration of the current Attack.
title: Cadillac

name: Lead Pipe
quote: “Everybody was kung fu fighting.”
abilities: Defense = +6 on a ‘Kung Fu’ Character.
title: Afro

name: Molotov Cocktail
quote: “Shaken or stirred?”
abilities: Discard from play to gain +15 DS for the duration of the current Attack OR remove one Location or ‘Vehicle’ from play.
title: Nubian

name: Muscle Car
abilities: Discard the Muscle Car from play to save a Character from being killed.
title: Bell Bottomed

name: Pimp Hat
quote: “Damn, that’s some bad hat.”
abilities: Defense = +4 to any ‘Soul’ Character.
title: Pimp

name: Platform Shoes
quote: “How’s the weather up there?”
abilities: Gives the Trait ‘Large’ to anyone wearing them.
title: Return

name: Saturday Night Special
quote: “What’s so special about it?” BLAM! “Oh, that.”
abilities: If the Character who has the Saturday Night Special gets killed, the gun goes back into your hand.
title: Rock

name: Sawed-off Shotgun
quote: “I sawed it off to make it shorter, just like yo’ gonna be once I pull the trigger.”
abilities: Once per turn you may discard a card from your hand to double this card’s printed DS for the duration of the current Attack.
title: Vengeance

name: Semi
quote: “We got a great Burt Convy rollin’ through this land…”
abilities: Defense = +6 if given to the “Trucker”.
title: Power

name: Sub-Machine Gun
quote: “0-60… bullets in a second!”
abilities: If this is used to boost a ‘Psycho Killer’ Attack, the attack will kill two Characters if it succeeds.
title: Jack

name: Tons of Gold Jewelry
quote: “Shiny AND bulletproof.”
abilities: Sacrifice from play to stop any ‘Soul’ Attack.
title: New York

name: Roll the Credits
quote: “Everybody’s getting’ it on, so it must be over.”
title: Brutha

name: Roll the Credits
quote: “Even the heroes are dead, so it must be all over!”
title: City

name: ...From Outer Space
quote: “Now that’s what I call a close encounter!”
abilities: Play on a Creature to double its current AS and give it the Trait ‘Alien’.
title: White

name: Bad Bust
quote: “That’s a violation of a brutha’s civil rights!”
abilities: Add +5 DS for the duration of the current Attack OR stop one non-’Soul’ Attack.
title: Africa

name: Betrayal
quote: “You may be my brother but they offered me dental!”
abilities: For every card you discard from your hand or Movie, each opponent must do the same.
title: Ring

name: Busted!
quote: “Yo gonna go away fo’ a long time, sucka!”
abilities: Remove a Character from play and place it at the bottom of the draw pile. Any cards attached to that Character are put in the discard pile.
title: Cop

name: Car Chase Sequence
quote: “Ultimate car chase of all time? It’s twelve minutes of two cards just driving around San Francisco.”
abilities: Kill one Character with a ‘Vehicle’ Prop OR kill a Character as long as one of your Characters has a ‘Vehicle’.
title: Hoodlum

name: Cat Fight
quote: “In a fight like this, there really aren’t any losers.”
abilities: Target a Movie with two or more ‘Female’ Characters in it. Pick two of the Females; the one with the lower current DS value (including any Props and Special Effects) is killed.
title: Private

name: Demon Possession
quote: “The power of Disco compels you!”
abilities: Take a Character from any Movie in play and use it to make a ‘Supernatural’, ‘Psycho Killer’ attack with an AS equal to 2x the printed DS of the Character. The Character can be used to attack any Movie, even the one it came from.
title: Devil

name: Disaster Flick
quote: “It opens with an earthquake during a hurricane and the excitement builds from there!”
abilities: Remove all Locations from play. For every card you discard when playing Disaster Flick, you may kill one Character from any Movie that had a Location before this card was played.
title: Boss

name: Double Cross
quote: “Et tu, brutha?”
abilities: For every two cards you discard from your hand, you may steal a Character from an opponent’s Movie. All Characters stolen must come from the same Movie.
title: Mack

name: Drive By Shooting
quote: “That’ll be $17.50 for the fare and $200.00 for the ammunition.”
abilities: For every card you discard from your hand you may kill a Character from an opponent’s Movie. You must have a card with either the ‘Gun’ or ‘Vehicle’ Trait in your Movie to play this card.
title: Down

name: Expository Dialogue
quote: “Queen Bee just told me that… oh why don’t you tell him, Queenie…”
abilities: Go through the draw pile and put into your hand the first card of each type you find (not including “Roll the Credits”). The rest of the cards are shuffled back into the draw pile.
title: Night

name: Extortion
quote: “Extortion is such an ugly word. Me and the brothers prefer *black*mail.”
abilities: Pick a player. For each card you discard from your hand you may kill one of that player’s Characters. For every two cards they give you from their hand, they may save a Character from being killed.
title: Brown

name: Fight the Power
quote: “We got to stick it to the man!”
abilities: Add +5 DS for the duration of the current Attack OR stop one ‘Soul’ Attack if you have a ‘Soul’ Character in your Movie.
title: Rage

name: Foxy Lady
quote: “She’s got a body to die for… and more than a few guys have!”
abilities: Give one ‘Female’ Character the trait ‘Soul’ and +2 DS for as long as she stays in play.
title: Prison

name: Gang Land Slaying
quote: “Cement shoes will be the perfect accessory for those cool threads.”
abilities: Kill any one Character as long as they have the Trait ‘Soul’.
title: Force

name: Gimmie Some Skin
quote: “We cool, brutha?” “Yeah, man, we cool.”
abilities: Play on any Character in a Movie with a ‘Cool’ Character. The chosen Character is now ‘Cool’ and gains +2 DS as long as the other Character stays in that Movie.
title: Showdown

name: Gratuitous Nudity
quote: “She needs to be topless in this scene.” “But it’s set in the courtroom. And she’s the Judge.”
abilities: Play after the credits have been rolled. Score 5 extra points for each ‘Female’ Character in your Movie.
title: Cleopatra

name: Gratuitous Violence
quote: “Blood washes everything clean”
abilities: Remove any card from play.
title: Chick

name: I Do All My Own Stunts
quote: “You want a brutha to jump outta what!?!”
abilities: Give one Character the Trait ‘Cool’ and +2DS as long as they live OR kill one Character of your choice.
title: Style

name: I’m Not An Actor, I’m A Movie Star!
quote: “I don’t get killed, I get the girl and I get lots and lots of money!”
abilities: Play on a ‘Male’ Character to render him unkillable. However he may not have more than one Prop at any time.
title: Sweet

name: I’m One Badass Mofo
quote: “You jive turkey, that ain’t gonna work on me!”
abilities: Stop one Special Effect as its played OR stop the use of one card’s special ability.
title: Superfly

name: Karate Lessons
quote: “While you was doing time, I put yo’ girls through karate school.”
abilities: Gives the trait ‘Kung Fu’ and +2 DS to one ‘Female’ Character.
title: Rumble

name: Ladies’ Man
quote: “I hope you cold, baby, ‘cause I’m gonna warm you up.”
abilities: Give one ‘Male’ Character the Trait ‘Cool’. That Character also gains +1 DS for every ‘Female’ Character in the same Movie.
title: Dance

name: Lame Script
quote: “I’ve seen better writing on a cereal box.”
abilities: Stop one Attack.
title: Leader

name: Left For Dead
quote: “I’ll take more than 12 slugs in the chest to keep me down.”
abilities: Take a Character out of the discard pile and put it directly into your Movie.
title: Ghetto

name: On The Run
quote: “Will this order be ‘to go’?” “You bet your sweet behind it is!”
abilities: Replace your Location with one from the discard pile. This can be done during an Attack.
title: Convict

name: Outta Sight
quote: “Nice try, sucka!”
abilities: Stop any card (except “Roll the Credits”) as it is being played.
title: Hell

name: Raging Gun Fight
quote: “Boss, you keep running through goons like this and we won’t have any left.”
abilities: Kill all Characters with a ‘Gun.’ Players may save their Characters by discarding two cards from the hand for each one they want to save.
title: Black Belt

name: Raid
quote: “It’s the fuzz!”
abilities: Remove one Location from play. For every card you discard from your hand, you may also kill a Character who was at that location. Cannot be played on the “Big House”, “Police Precinct”, or the “Police Station”.
title: Lethal

name: Right On!
quote: “Yo man! Why toy wearin’ shades at night?” “Cause when you’re as cool as me, the sun’s akways shinin’!” “Right on!”
abilities: Give one Character a permanent +2 DS and the Trait ‘Cool’.
title: Song

name: Riot
quote: “Time for a crime spree!”
abilities: All Creature cards played until the end of your next turn have double the AS and the trait ‘Swarm’.
title: Fire

name: Road Block
quote: “Don’t park the cars so far apart this time!”
abilities: Stop any one card (except “Roll the Credits”) as it is being played.
title: Skid Row

name: Rumble
quote: “Let’s get ready to… well, you know.”
abilities: Pick an opponent and kill any number of Characters of your choice from their movie. Then they choose an equal number of your Characters to kill. You may not kill more of your opponent’s characters than you have in your movie.
title: Avenge

name: Solid
quote: “Thanks, brother, I owe you one.”
abilities: Stop one Character from being killed for any reason.
title: Town

name: Soul Brother
quote: “When you mess with me, you mess with my family… and my neighbors… and my butcher… and the kid who delivers my paper… and…”
abilities: Play on a ‘Soul’ Character. They gain +1 DS for every other ‘Soul’ character in the same Movie.
title: Machine

name: Stake Out
quote: “Do you ever get the feeling that you’re being watched?”
abilities: Add +5 DS for the duration of the current Attack OR stop one Attack if you have a “Cop” Character in your Movie.
title: Sheba

name: Stylin’!
quote: “Dig the threads, brother. Dig the threads.”
abilities: Give one ‘Male’ Character a permanent +2 DS and the trait ‘Soul’ for as long as they remain in play.
title: Cotton

name: Superimposed Background
quote: “Get me wardrobe. He can’t be wearing a blue jacket for a bluescreen effect.”
abilities: Stop one Special Effect card as it is played. The card is discarded with no effect.
title: South Side

name: Surprise Ending
quote: “That was just the intermission; the movie’s only half over.”
abilities: Stop someone from playing a “Roll the Credits” card and put the “Roll the Credits” card into your hand. Play continues as normal.
title: Jackson

name: Unnecessary Love Scene
quote: “Nothing get’s me hornier than having my whole family killed and being on the run from the mob.”
abilities: Target a player with a ‘Male’ and ‘Female’ Character in their Movie. That player misses their next turn.
title: Battle

name: Vengeance
quote: “Ain’t payback a bitch?”
abilities: Play when one of your Characters gets killed. Kill any Character from the Movie of the player responsible for your Character’s death.
title: Sex

name: Wooden Performance
quote: “Look. Out. Be-hind. You. He. Has. Got. A. Gun. Man.”
abilities: Reduce one Character’s DS (including all attached cards) to 0.
title: Jive
